We have a responsibility to defend the dignity of all life, from conception to natural death. I thank Sen. Lankford for his leadership on this issue over the years, & I’m happy to partner with him to advance our legislation that would make dismemberment abortions illegal.

Today, @SenatorLankford & I introduced legislation to prohibit docs from performing dismemberment abortions, a brutal method of abortion where unborn children are dismembered and extracted one piece at a time.

Following the precedent set by former Senate Majority Leader Harry Reid (D-Nevada), the rules change merely streamlines the confirmation process for lower-level nominees. This will allow @POTUS @realdonaldtrump to fill important vacancies at a reasonable pace.
.@SenateDems are delaying for the sake of delaying because of their dislike for @POTUS @realDonaldTrump. It’s time to end Democrats’ obstruction.

In the first two years of the Obama administration, there were just 12 cloture votes on the president’s nominees. By contrast, @SenateDems have required 128 cloture votes for @POTUS’s nominees, many of which passed unanimously or near-unanimously.

"The status quo is unfair, unhealthy & unsustainable. This president & all future presidents deserve a more functional process for building their administrations." @senatemajldr is right – we need to take steps to reform our process for nominations. https://www.politico.com/magazine/story/2019/04/01/mitch-mcconnell-obstruction-democrats-226341 …
